BBEX3.A.BHD.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Bahrain / USD 1 = BHD ... (buying)
General: The Bahraini dinar is pegged to the US dollar.
Source: Since 2009: National Bank of Bahrain, Manama. 1996 - 2008: The British Bank of the Middle East, Manama.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
